data.name: Lost and found - What if I come and find it
data.detailed_description:
WELCOME TO THE JOB MARKET


Lost and Found – What if I come and find it is a first-person narrative game in development whose story will take you to the depths of working in a major corporation. Full with excitement, you arrive to your new promised job as a maintenance apprentice, but something weird happens when they assign you the Lost Items Department... How much are you willing to put up with in order to reach the top of your career?



The Arcade mode is currently available under Early Access. In this mode, you will compete for the highest number of duros per resolved note in the shortest possible time. This mechanic lays the foundations for the Story mode. Improve your records and dethrone the top 3 Steam players in each category.



When you’ll have enough duros, you will be able to spend them on a helper or unlocking themed lost items (with lots of references to popular culture and to the video games industry).

Story Mode (In development)

  • Narrative-driven story inspired by true events from corporate tech world’s work experiences which will make you think about current job market.
  • Mechanics which range from mental agility or puzzle resolution to stealth.
  • Episodic format. All episodes will be available as free game updates.

Modo Arcade (Ya disponible)

  • +100 interactive items and notes to resolve thanks to your prodigious intellect.
  • The player’s ability and agility are rewarded. Do your best and take the first position in the Hall of Fame (Steam worldwide ranking within the game).
  • Unlockable helpers in exchange for duros to make your job easier.
  • Unlockable items packs in exchange for duros.
  • Basket (using lost items to practice this sport is not recommended).
  • Rescue little animals and give them a better life.

data.short_description: The definitive precarious employment simulator! You are about to become part of Silvercup. You have a bright future ahead… but you’ll have to start from the bottom! Resolve the ridiculously ambiguous notes from the lost items department in order to make progress in your career.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 4130 or AMD A10 6800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated graphic card or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7 3770 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
